triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: SpatialAgent integrates large language models as a core component for autonomous reasoning and decision-making.

triples.name: Spatial biology
triples.relevance: Spatial biology is the research domain and primary application area that SpatialAgent is designed to solve.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: Artificial intelligence is the foundational technology underlying SpatialAgent's autonomous capabilities.

triples.name: Multimodal learning
triples.relevance: SpatialAgent performs multimodal data analysis, integrating different types of biological data for comprehensive analysis.

triples.name: Hypothesis
triples.relevance: SpatialAgent autonomously generates novel hypotheses from data analysis as part of its research pipeline.
